items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale, Amazon is offering Microsoft’s Surface Laptop (2025) touchscreen Copilot+ PC for $649.99 shipped. This entry-level model, equipped with 16GB of RAM and 256GB of storage, debuted at $900 a few months back. It dropped to the $700 mark shortly after the previous Prime Day sale, but today’s 28% discount shaves an additional $50 off. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this touchscreen notebook to date, so be sure to snag it if you were eyeing one of these. The 16GB/512GB variant of this laptop is also down to $799.99 shipped, which is the lowest we have seen it fetch to date. Head below for more details.

items.summary:
As part of the ongoing fall Prime Day sale, Amazon is offering Samsung’s 256GB PRO Ultimate microSD + adapter combo for $24.99 Prime shipped. Don’t forget to clip the on-page $10 off coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. This memory card typically sells for $35 and is still listed at full price on Samsung’s own site, but Amazon currently has it at a solid 28% discount. Today’s deal knocks $10 off its usual going rate, matching the lowest price we’ve seen for this model. With the on-page coupon applied, this card is now only $1 more than the 128GB version. Meanwhile, the 512GB model with the included adapter is available for $54.99 shipped – once you clip the on-page coupon – matching one of the lowest prices we’ve seen for it. Head below for more details.
